properties.body:
BRAZIL-NORTH COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY BY M/V HAWK EXPLORER TOWING
   5.4 MILE LONG CABLES:
   A. 31 JAN AND 01 FEB IN AREA BOUND BY
      01-39.43S 038-44.22W, 02-31.97S-037-32.48W,
      03-18.48S 038-08.30W, 02-48.27S 037-15.87W.
   B. 02 FEB IN AREA BOUND BY
      02-31.97S 037-32.48W, 02-01.60S 037-22.77W,
      03-12.32S 038-17.20W, 03-18.48S 038-08.30W.
   SEVEN MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 03 FEB.
